scene_metadata.title: Healing Over Protection
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: the insufficiency of armor against existential wounds

dialogue.text: Since then, you've tried hard to protect yourself no matter what. But you need healing, not protection. And emotional healing comes from the love and support of others.

panel_2.description: The armor cracking, light seeping through

panel_3.description: Warm light of connection replacing cold armor

visual_elements.voice_visualization: Warm presence surrounding but not overwhelming
visual_elements.lighting: Transition from cold defensive blue to warm healing gold

psychological_notes: The voice identifies the core trauma response: hyperprotection. The profound shift from 'protection' to 'healing' reframes Evan's entire defensive strategy. Protection is solo; healing is relational.
philosophical_underpinning: We cannot protect ourselves into wholeness; healing requires the risk of connection
therapeutic_direction: Moving from defensive isolation toward vulnerable interdependence
